mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(TA.bc_period, TB.ex_period) AS period, SUM(TA.count) AS bc_count, SUM(TB.count) AS ex_count FROM ( SELECT SUM(bc.payment_amount) AS count, TO_CHAR(bc.charge_date, 'YYYYMMDD') AS bc_period FROM bamboo_charge bc WHERE bc.charge_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(bc.charge_date, 'YYYYMMDD') ) TA FULL OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(ex.total) - SUM(ex.payment_amount) AS count, TO_CHAR(ex.approve_date, 'YYYYMMDD') AS ex_period FROM exchange ex WHERE ex.approve_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ex.approve_date, 'YYYYMMDD') ) TB ON TA.bc_period = TB.ex_period GROUP BY COALESCE(TA.bc_period, TB.ex_period) ORDER BY period

SELECT COALESCE(TA.bc_period, TB.ex_period) AS period, SUM(TA.count) AS bc_count, SUM(TB.count) AS ex_count FROM ( SELECT SUM(bc.payment_amount) AS count, TO_CHAR(bc.charge_date, 'YYYYMM') AS bc_period FROM bamboo_charge bc WHERE bc.charge_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(bc.charge_date, 'YYYYMM') ) TA FULL OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUM(ex.total) - SUM(ex.payment_amount) AS count, TO_CHAR(ex.approve_date, 'YYYYMM') AS ex_period FROM exchange ex WHERE ex.approve_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ex.approve_date, 'YYYYMM') ) TB ON TA.bc_period = TB.ex_period GROUP BY COALESCE(TA.bc_period, TB.ex_period) ORDER BY period
